meanings.definition: A book containing photographs or illustrations, typically used for promotional purposes.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed flipping through the viewbook of the new theme park.
meanings.sent2: The college sent me a viewbook showcasing their campus and programs.
meanings.sent3: The viewbook of exotic animals made me want to visit the zoo.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a viewbook of memories, each page filled with vivid images.
meanings.sent5: The viewbook of travel destinations was so colorful and enticing.

meanings.definition: To look at or inspect closely.
meanings.sent1: She likes to viewbook the details of each painting in the museum.
meanings.sent2: I need to viewbook the contract before signing it.
meanings.sent3: He decided to viewbook the ingredients before trying the new recipe.
meanings.sent4: The detective viewbooked the crime scene for any clues.
meanings.sent5: Before buying a car, it's important to viewbook its condition thoroughly.
